column9: I have a bulging disk in my back & neck...also degenerative disk disease. This has given me complete relief! I sleep better as well. Flexeril had stopped working for me after years of taking it...so I am thankful I discussed that with my doc, & he put me on this!

column9: I had very strong muscle spasms in my upper back. This medecinf, along with another anti-inflamatory prescription, helped it relax and go away. My mother was prescribed this drug for hip pains. I suspect the dr believed her pain was from muscles not joints. It helps her daily.
